item.title: [Python] General Relativity in Python: Introduction
item.description: In this article, using Python, is required in general relativity ãƒ» **Calculation of various tensors including metric $g_{\mu \nu}$** Simple calculation of Einstein equation Introduce how to do. [Reference] For computing about tensor analysis and algebraic calculation in general relativity, Heinicke, C., et.al.- Computer Algebra in Gravity Korolkova, A., et.al.- Tensor computations in computer algebra systems There are also handy Review papers, so please refer to them as appropriate.
